title: Yesterday tab - no games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into the app 
AND they are viewing the daily leaderboard 
AND there were no games played yesterday (as in, no baseball games, does not matter if the user played or not)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Yesterday" tab
custom_expected: THEN the leaderboard should show a blank leaderboard page with text on it that says “No scores to show for this day”.

title: Yesterday tab - with games
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into the app AND they are viewing the daily leaderboard AND there were games played yesterday
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "Yesterday" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the leaderboard should show ranking info. 'Final Scores Posted' banner should be displayed.
THEN total players should be displayed
THEN Prize Winners should be displayed and users are highlighted in green and $ sign is displayed
THEN Top Scores should be displayed - if user is under 21 he is only displayed in Top Scores section

title: Yesterday tab switch
custom_preconds: GIVEN the use is on the daily leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: Switch to YESTERDAY leaderboard
Choose Profile, then go back to rankings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN yesterday's rankings will display, not today's data

title: Connection Loss
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the daily leaderboard
custom_steps:
WHEN a user loses connection (not airplane mode, create a 500)
 - Rewrite the query: https://gaming.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/leaderboards/daily to respond with a 500 request in Charles
![](index.php?/attachments/get/27582)
custom_expected: THEN no data will load and the user will see a "No scores are posted yet." message

title: Today tab - no game played yet
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into the app
AND they are viewing the daily leaderboard
AND No one played any game yet
custom_expected: Text 'No scores are posted yet. Check back once players start earning scores for today's picks' is displayed.

title: Today tab - no game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into the app
AND they are viewing the daily leaderboard
AND there were no games played today
custom_steps: THEN the leaderboard should show a blank leaderboard page with text 'No scores to show for this day’.

title: Today tab - all games are final
custom_expected:
THEN the leaderboard should show ranking info. 'Final Scores Posted' banner should be displayed.
THEN total players should be displayed
THEN Prize Winners should be displayed and users are highlighted in green and $ sign is displayed
THEN Top Scores should be displayed - if user is under 21 he is only displayed in Top Scores section

title: Today tab - games in progress
custom_expected:
"Top Scores" and total players are displayed.
Players are not highlighted in green and no $ sign is displayed

title: Leaderboards
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is participating in a game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to a game leaderboard they are participating in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN: 
- Player is listed in the contest leaderboard as soon as a prop they made a pick on is - resolved
- The points on the game leaderboard should be the same as the points on the game view
- Player's level/rank is displayed next to their nickname
- Level/rank changes if the player goes up due to another game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to a daily leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN: 
- Player is listed in the daily leaderboard within a minute of them appearing on the contest leaderboard
- Player's level/rank is displayed next to their nickname
- Level/rank changes if the player goes up

title: Game Rankings
custom_preconds: User played the games and games are now final.

custom_steps_separated.content: % on the Contest Leaderboard

title: User highlight behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Rankings page
custom_expected:
THEN the user is shown as a blue bar AND the blue bar isn't flashing
note: the blue bar should show even when the user's ranking is below the rankings currently displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  the user is scrolled to a position that is less than the user’s current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue bar sticks at the bottom of the leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user first opens the leaderboard AND the user is in the first set of visible ranks
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the default view shows the top of the leaderboard (starting with position 1) AND the user’s position is highlighted blue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the blue bar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to their position in the leaderboard

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user scrolls to the user’s position in the leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue bar for the user will slot in to the correct position

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  the user is scrolled to a position that is greater than the user’s current position
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the blue bar sticks at the top of the leaderboard

title: Simple leaderboard behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN no games have been played that day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the daily leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message is displayed saying there are no rankings and to come back later

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user plays a couple games and make picks that resolve
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the contest leaderboard is populated throughout the game with each game having their own leaderboard AND daily leaderboard is populated and updates in relation to highest placement in contest leaderboards

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user logs back in the next day before any games have been played
custom_steps_separated.expected: Daily leaderboard is cleared out and the no rankings yet message is displayed

title: Ranking
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Rankings Tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters game leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the top of the leaderboard should be displayed (not scroll to you)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters game leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Prestige/level ranking in the leaderboard should show user’s current value, not the historical value at the time the leaderboard was calculated.

title: Ranking Cells
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Rankings Tab
custom_expected: THEN Ranking Cells should NOT be selectable

title: Cell Info
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has been placed on the daily leaderboard
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the daily leaderboard
custom_expected:
THEN the cell should display the following: 
- a ranked list of the usernames based on the highest scores accrued in any single game so far that day
- which game the user scored those points in by showing [AWAY] @ [HOME] tricodes
- place number for each user, with special treatment for the top N finishers

title: Underage Users
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user under the age of 21
custom_steps: WHEN this user make it into the top 3 scores of the day (after all games are final)
custom_expected:
THEN this user will be ranked appropriately
    AND the user will not be highlighted green or have a money symbol next to their name
    AND the next highest of-age user will be highlighted and have a money symbol indicating they are "in the money"

The user is displayed in Top Scores and not in Prize Winners even if the user made it to the top 3.

title: Sharing ranking and position
custom_steps: When 2 users (or more) get the same amount of points
custom_expected: They share the same ranking and position on the leaderboards
